Slim-fit trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back  pockets and flared legs.
Fitted knee-length skirt in jersey with wide ribbing at the waist for best fit, and a slit at the back.

Fully lined, lace shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.
Top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrapover hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in a spotted premium cotton dobby weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit – a modern fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
V-neck top in viscose jersey with a lace yoke, 3/4-length sleeves and gathered side seams for best fit.
V-neck top in viscose jersey with a lace yoke, 3/4-length sleeves and gathered side seams for best fit.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 2-12Y), a visible button fly and raw-edge frayed hems.

Popover jacket in a woven cotton blend with a drawstring hood, collar, zip at the front and concealed zip at one side. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs, a kangaroo pocket and a concealed compartment with a zip. Lined.

Popover jacket in a woven cotton blend with a drawstring hood, collar, zip at the front and concealed zip at one side. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs, a kangaroo pocket and a concealed compartment with a zip. Lined.
Velour top with a V-neck, short, wide sleeves and a gathered seam with a tie belt at the waist.
Longer, off-the-shoulder top in a fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Double layer at the top, long sleeves and gathered side seams for best fit.
Longer, off-the-shoulder top in a fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Double layer at the top, long sleeves and gathered side seams for best fit.
Joggers in patterned jersey with a soft brushed finish. Drawstring at the waist, wide elasticated ribbing at the top, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Microfibre bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Short, fitted dress in jersey with a lace yoke, opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a viscose blend with a wrapover front and a seam and ties at the waist. Gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Lace dress with a V-neck at the back, 3/4-length sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with a silk ribbon tie detail. Lined front and skirt.
Sequin-embroidered boots in faux fur with faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short dress in jersey containing glittery threads with a round neckline that has an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and short, flounced sleeves.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length wrap dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed press-stud at the front. Adjustable spaghetti straps, a seam and tie belt under the bust and an asymmetric skirt. Lined at the top.
Trenchcoat in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a loose yoke front and back, pockets in the side seams, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. Unlined.
Quilted, gently fitted, lightweight coat with a small stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Filling 90% down and 10% feathers.
